subject: Fix context bar/page selector conflict, sample image cell assignment, and reader mode sizing
body:
- Remove page navigation from ContextBar to eliminate confusion with PageStrip's
  similar-looking move/navigate arrows. PageStrip remains the sole page manager.
- Add targetCell parameter to addImage() so sample images and uploads assign to
  the currently selected cell instead of auto-picking the first unoccupied one.
- Pass selectedCell through TemplatesTab and MediaTab to addImage calls.
- Make reader mode use full viewport: remove max-w-4xl cap, increase canvas
  height to fill screen minus header, and reduce padding.
